value:
So you just fire off that Breidablik
and a Hero pops out? Pretty neat...
How's it work, exactly?

Our village is a good place—it's
peaceful. Gray says it's lacking a
certain something, but...$k$pit's home.

Still hard at work, huh? If you're
feeling even a little tired, be sure
to take a break.$k$pThere isn't anyone around here
who can replace you.

If you have some time, let's
explore the castle. Should be
pretty fun, right?

Mmh-huh? Sorry, you caught me
napping. Everyone's talking about
such complicated things, and...$k$pAwwh... It just makes me so
sleepy.

$Nu?
Got a message for you from
$Nf.

Oh, man, look at these muscles.
Who wants to touch 'em?
Heh, not bad!

Huh?
That's it?

You're really trusting me with this
power? I don't know what to say...

I'm Tobin, a fighter in the
Deliverance. I joined up to
fight alongside my friends.$k$pI'm not too sure what's going
on in this world, but...
I'm here to help.

I try to find souvenirs for my
siblings between fights, but I can't
afford anything too pricey.$k$pMaybe a jar, or some nice cloth.
Looking at things like that helps
me picture their faces...$k$pAnd that cheers me up,
you know?$k$pTake a look at this cog. It's a
small part of something larger.
Really makes you think...$k$pYou think so too? I knew you'd
understand. Here, you can have
it if you want.$k$pI mean, I picked it up for you,
after all. I can't get you
anything too fancy, but...$k$pWell, I saw this and pictured
your face. It can be proof of
our friendship. Er, I mean...$k$pUh, it's my way of saying thanks.
Here I go!
おりゃあっ
Darn that stings!
うわあああーっ！！
This is the part that hurts!
You and me!
This one's mine!
Have some of this!
Augh...
Hehheh
I'm not great with the tough stuff.
Oh, need something? Ready to do my best.
Our village? It's a great place.
Hey! Is this any time to be fooling around?
Might have to tell me something twice before it sinks in.
There's no way I'm going to let Alm show me up.
You're pretty interesting, you know that?
Yeah!
Hmmm...
Leave it to me!
